Maybe just do a time conflict if ee16a is webcasted?

^The final times would coincide in that case..

Email the professors and let them know of your situation, and see if they are willing to make any accommodations.
Maybe just do a time conflict if ee16a is webcasted?

children.subject:
During the semester EE16A and 54 concurrently is fine. If anything it makes both classes easier since you are practicing some of the same principles.

Not sure about summer though.

history.content: Bombed Math 54 so I have to retake to boost my GPA. But I'm trying to minor in EECS and originally my plan was to take EE16A in the fall. However, it's at the same time as Cogsci 1 in the Fall. So now it seems like my only option is to take it in the summer with math 54. Is this smart? I enrolled in Cogsci 1 in the summer because I was also considering that but I am 30 on the waitlist so I doubt I'd get off. I don't have any breadths left to take.
history.subject: EE16A and Math 54 concurrently in the summer?
